name: Bounty Hunter (itch) (Binus Game Development Club)
description:
Bounty Hunter is a 2D game where you are a bounty hunter on his quest to kill all criminals

Controls:

A - Move Left
D - Move Right
Space - Jump
Shift - Dash
Left Click - Shoot

Credits:
